name: REDMAN: Mad Game
description: Redman hates everything and everyone around him, he does not have a machine gun, magic or a sword to destroy annoying red balls. But there are - circular saws, stakes, harpoons, giant clubs, which will cut and chop it, but he will not stop, yet will not be left alone. Each ball destroyed will bring closer the player to a secret room with great secrets! Try to complete all levels and complete the game. Mad game begins!
